badmessages: No one cares if you're poor!
Instead of just sittin' around beggin', get your butt up and get a job!
Oh, the next time I see you, you'll be walkin' out the drug store with beer and tabaco!
You're the reason humanity is evolving backwards!
You remind me of a penny; Worthless.

goodmessages: Oh you're just a poor beggar, here.
Its sad to see you like this! Here, have some.
Hope you get a job! In the meantime, here, have some.
If you really need it, here. Spend it wisely.
